lg.dedication: for the students of Mountjoy Prison

lg.l: in this new suit cut from a quart of ironlight.
how the pleats unfold like threads of water.
Wear this suit in honour of a wing.
Wear this suit despite the darkness that inhabits
Walk forward in the footsteps of Elatha
who emerged out of the sea
bearing five twisted metals around his neck
and for his son a hollow
A city is a form of remembering.
You too are born of kings.
